title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state. The view that was previously maximized is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state even after switching perspectives. The view that was maximized before switching perspectives should continue to be maximized.
SR:
1. Open the CVS repository view.
2. Maximize the view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized, which should not happen.
